longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and/or passport replacing documents must be valid
  on arrival.
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Slovakia. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Slovakia will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Slovakia are expected to
  hold their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Visitors are required to hold documents required for their
  next destination. (SEE NOTE 54543)
    NOTE 54543: Not applicable to nationals of EEA Member
   States  and Switzerland.
Warning:
- Visitors not holding return/onward tickets  co
  uld be refused entry. (SEE NOTE 54543) 
    NOTE 54543: Not applicable to nationals of EEA Member
   States  and Switzerland
vaccination:
Vaccinations not required.

Recommended:
- Malaria prophylaxis: malaria risk, mainly due to P.
  falciparum, exists throughout the year. Recommended
  prevention: C.
